Runesmith:CraftFirestone.NAME: Craft Firestone
Runesmith:CraftFirestone.DESCRIPTION: 2 Ignis: Craft a Firestone rune with !Pot! Potency.

Runesmith:CraftProtectio.NAME: Craft Protectio
Runesmith:CraftProtectio.DESCRIPTION: 2 Terra: Craft a Protectio rune with !Pot! Potency.

Runesmith:Fortify.NAME: Fortify
Runesmith:Fortify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Enhance a random card in your hand.
Runesmith:Fortify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Enhance a card in your hand.

Runesmith:HeatedChisel.NAME: Heated Chisel
Runesmith:HeatedChisel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Gain 1 Ignis and 1 Terra.

Runesmith:Terraform.NAME: Terraform
Runesmith:Terraform.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Terra. NL Gain Block equals to double the amount of Terra.
Runesmith:Terraform.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Terra. NL Gain Block equals to triple the number of Terra.

Runesmith:RuneHurl.NAME: Rune Hurl
Runesmith:RuneHurl.DESCRIPTION: Break oldest rune to deal !D! damage.

Runesmith:CraftIncendium.NAME: Craft Incendium
Runesmith:CraftIncendium.DESCRIPTION: 3 Ignis: Craft an Incendium rune with !Pot! Potency.

Runesmith:HammerSlam.NAME: Hammer Slam
Runesmith:HammerSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card for each unique Rune you have.
Runesmith:HammerSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card for each unique Rune you have plus one.

Runesmith:ElementalConversion.NAME: Convert Elements
Runesmith:ElementalConversion.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Convert Ignis, Convert Terra or Convert Aqua.
Runesmith:ElementalConversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose: Convert Ignis+, Convert Terra+ or Convert Aqua+.

Runesmith:ConvertIgnis.NAME: Convert Ignis
Runesmith:ConvertIgnis.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Ignis. NL Gain !M! Terra and 1 Aqua.

Runesmith:ConvertTerra.NAME: Convert Terra
Runesmith:ConvertTerra.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Terra. NL Gain !M! Ignis and 1 Aqua.

Runesmith:ConvertAqua.NAME: Convert Aqua
Runesmith:ConvertAqua.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Aqua. NL Gain 1 Ignis and 1 Terra.

Runesmith:Repurpose.NAME: Repurpose
Runesmith:Repurpose.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Attack: Gain !M! Ignis NL Skill: Gain !M! Terra NL Power: Gain !M! Aqua. NL Status card: Gain 1 of each.
Runesmith:Repurpose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. Attack: Gain !M! Ignis NL Skill: Gain !M! Terra NL Power: Gain !M! Aqua. NL Status card: Gain 1 of each NL Curse: Gain 2 of each.

Runesmith:EnchantedChisel.NAME: Enchanted Chisel
Runesmith:EnchantedChisel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain 1 Ignis and 1 Aqua.

Runesmith:UnstableHammer.NAME: Unstable Hammer
Runesmith:UnstableHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Craft a Dud rune. NL Gain 1 random Element.

Runesmith:HammerThrow.NAME: Hammer Throw
Runesmith:HammerThrow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage then draw !M! card and Upgrade them.

Runesmith:OneForEveryone.NAME: One for Everyone
Runesmith:OneForEveryone.DESCRIPTION: Break your oldest rune to NL gain [E] , deal 1 damage, apply 1 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies, NL gain 1 Block, gain 1 of each Element and draw 1 card.

Runesmith:RunicBullets.NAME: Runic Bullets
Runesmith:RunicBullets.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each rune you have.

Runesmith:StaticCage.NAME: Static Cage
Runesmith:StaticCage.DESCRIPTION: Break your oldest Rune. NL Stasis a card in your hand. NL Gain !B! Block.

Runesmith:ElementalShield.NAME: Elemental Shield
Runesmith:ElementalShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equals to double the amount of all your Elements. NL Remove half of your Elements.
Runesmith:ElementalShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equals to triple the amount of all your Elements. NL Remove half of your Elements.

Runesmith:Grindstone.NAME: Grindstone
Runesmith:Grindstone.DESCRIPTION: All cards played this turn become upgraded. NL Enhance the card if it is already upgraded.

Runesmith:FieryHammer.NAME: Fiery Hammer
Runesmith:FieryHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

Runesmith:CraftReservo.NAME: Craft Reservo
Runesmith:CraftReservo.DESCRIPTION: 2 Aqua: Craft a Reservo rune. NL Exhaust.
Runesmith:CraftReservo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 2 Aqua: Craft a Reservo+ rune. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:Firestorm.NAME: Firestorm
Runesmith:Firestorm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Ignis and !M! Terra at the start of your turn.

Runesmith:RunicBlueprint.NAME: Runic Blueprint
Runesmith:RunicBlueprint.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Craft card to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Gain 2 Aqua. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:CraftSpiculum.NAME: Craft Spiculum
Runesmith:CraftSpiculum.DESCRIPTION: 3 Ignis 1 Aqua: Craft a Spiculum rune with !Pot! Potency. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:CraftPotentia.NAME: Craft Potentia
Runesmith:CraftPotentia.DESCRIPTION: 2 Ignis 2 Terra 2 Aqua: Craft a Potentia rune with !Pot! Potency and remove your oldest rune.

Runesmith:CraftFerro.NAME: Craft Ferro
Runesmith:CraftFerro.DESCRIPTION: 2 Terra 1 Aqua: Craft a Ferro rune with !Pot! Potency. Exhaust.
Runesmith:CraftFerro.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 2 Terra 1 Aqua: Craft a Ferro rune with !Pot! Potency.

Runesmith:HammerTime.NAME: Hammer Time
Runesmith:HammerTime.DESCRIPTION: Enhance ALL of your cards containing "Hammer". Deal !D! damage.
Runesmith:HammerTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enhance ALL of your cards containing "Hammer" twice. Deal !D! damage.

Runesmith:MakeshiftArmor.NAME: Makeshift Armor
Runesmith:MakeshiftArmor.DESCRIPTION: Downgrade a random card in your deck. Gain !B! Block. Gain 1 Terra.

Runesmith:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting Strike
Runesmith:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Downgrade a card. Upgrade a card.

Runesmith:ChaoticBlast.NAME: Chaotic Blast
Runesmith:ChaoticBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. !M! Ignis !M! Terra !M! Aqua: Craft a random rune.
Runesmith:ChaoticBlast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. !M! Ignis !M! Terra !M! Aqua: Craft two random runes.

Runesmith:Shatterune.NAME: Shatterune
Runesmith:Shatterune.DESCRIPTION: Break your oldest rune X times.
Runesmith:Shatterune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Break your oldest rune X+1 times.

Runesmith:Empowerment.NAME: Empowerment
Runesmith:Empowerment.DESCRIPTION: Gain Strength equal to Ignis and gain Dexterity equal to Terra this turn.

Runesmith:RunicSmithing.NAME: Runic Smithing
Runesmith:RunicSmithing.DESCRIPTION: For each card you enhance, you gain 1 of each Elements.
Runesmith:RunicSmithing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For each card you enhance, you gain 1 of each Elements. NL Innate.

Runesmith:Duplicate.NAME: Duplicate
Runesmith:Duplicate.DESCRIPTION: Create a copy of the next rune you craft this turn.
Runesmith:Duplicate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Create a copy of the next !M! runes you craft this turn.

Runesmith:ConstructBifrost.NAME: Construct Bifrost
Runesmith:ConstructBifrost.DESCRIPTION: 1 Ignis 1 Terra 1 Aqua: Craft a Prismatic rune.
Runesmith:ConstructBifrost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 1 Ignis 1 Terra 1 Aqua: Craft a Prismatic+ rune.

Runesmith:CraftMedicinae.NAME: Craft Medicinae
Runesmith:CraftMedicinae.DESCRIPTION: 5 Terra: Craft a Medicinae rune with !Pot! Potency. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:LastStand.NAME: Last Stand
Runesmith:LastStand.DESCRIPTION: Downgrade ALL cards in your deck. Remove all Elements. Deal !M! times the number of Downgraded cards to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:Demonforge.NAME: Demonforge
Runesmith:Demonforge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Potency. Lose 1 Potency at the end of each turn.

Runesmith:SpecialReserve.NAME: Special Reserve
Runesmith:SpecialReserve.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and stasis !M! card in your deck.

Runesmith:GenerateForcefield.NAME: Generate Forcefield
Runesmith:GenerateForcefield.DESCRIPTION: Break X runes and prevent the next X times you would lose HP.
Runesmith:GenerateForcefield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Break X+1 runes and prevent the next X+1 times you would lose HP.

Runesmith:EnergeticExplosion.NAME: Energetic Explosion
Runesmith:EnergeticExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Break all of your runes. Draw a card and gain [E] for each rune destroyed.

Runesmith:CreatorForm.NAME: Creator Form
Runesmith:CreatorForm.DESCRIPTION: Enhance !M! cards at the start of your turn.

Runesmith:FlexTape.NAME: Flex Tape
Runesmith:FlexTape.DESCRIPTION: Stasis !M! card in your hand each turn.
Runesmith:FlexTape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Stasis !M! cards in your hand each turn.

Runesmith:MetallurgicalResearch.NAME: Metallurgical Research
Runesmith:MetallurgicalResearch.DESCRIPTION: Downgrade your entire deck then Upgrade and Enhance your entire deck after !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:ArmorUp.NAME: Armor Up
Runesmith:ArmorUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to !M! times the numbers of card Enhanced this combat.

Runesmith:Border Wall.NAME: Border Wall
Runesmith:Border Wall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. 4 Terra: Craft 2 Protectio rune with !Pot! Potency.

Runesmith:RuneMagnet.NAME: Rune Magnet
Runesmith:RuneMagnet.DESCRIPTION: Draw until you get a Craft card and discard all other cards drawn. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:ThatsALotOfDamage.NAME: That's A Lot Of DAMAGE!
Runesmith:ThatsALotOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Halves enemies current HP and Block. NL Exhaust.
Runesmith:ThatsALotOfDamage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Halves enemies current HP and Block. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:CraftMagma.NAME: Craft Magma
Runesmith:CraftMagma.DESCRIPTION: 2 Ignis 1 Terra: Craft a Magma rune with !Pot! Potency.

Runesmith:Rearm.NAME: Rearm
Runesmith:Rearm.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle all Upgraded cards from your discard pile into your draw pile.  NL Draw !M! cards.

Runesmith:UnlimitedPower.NAME: Unlimited Power
Runesmith:UnlimitedPower.DESCRIPTION: Elements are no longer consumed for Crafting.
Runesmith:UnlimitedPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Elements are no longer consumed for Crafting. NL Innate.

Runesmith:ForcesOfNature.NAME: Forces Of Nature
Runesmith:ForcesOfNature.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equals to the amount of elements gained this combat to ALL enemies.
Runesmith:ForcesOfNature.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equals to double the amount of elements gained this combat to ALL enemies.

Runesmith:GrandSlam.NAME: Grand Slam
Runesmith:GrandSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal 13 damage. Enhance all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
Runesmith:GrandSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal 13 damage. Enhance all cards in your hand twice. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:GoWithTheFlow.NAME: Go With The Flow
Runesmith:GoWithTheFlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Aqua. Gain 1 Potency. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:PerfectChisel.NAME: Perfect Chisel
Runesmith:PerfectChisel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain 1 of each Element. Gain !M! Potency for this turn.

Runesmith:DoubleUp.NAME: Double Up
Runesmith:DoubleUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Upgrade !M! card in your hand and Enhance it.
Runesmith:DoubleUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Upgrade !M! cards in your hand and Enhance them.

Runesmith:Refinement.NAME: Refinement
Runesmith:Refinement.DESCRIPTION: Enhance a card X-1 times. Gain [E] if you spend at least [E] .
Runesmith:Refinement.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enhance a card X times. Gain [E] if you spend at least [E] .

Runesmith:Permafrost.NAME: Permafrost
Runesmith:Permafrost.DESCRIPTION: Block won't go below half at the start of your turn. NL Gain 1 Terra and 1 Aqua.

Runesmith:Enchant.NAME: Enchant
Runesmith:Enchant.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
Runesmith:Enchant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upgrade and Enhance all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Runesmith:HeatExchange.NAME: Heat Exchange
Runesmith:HeatExchange.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. This card gains additional damage equal to current Ignis. Lose 2 Ignis.
Runesmith:HeatExchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. This card gains additional damage twice the current Ignis. Lose 2 Ignis.

Runesmith:PoweredAnvil.NAME: Powered Anvil
Runesmith:PoweredAnvil.DESCRIPTION: After you Enhanced a card, Enhance it one additional time.
Runesmith:PoweredAnvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: After you Enhanced a card, Enhance it one additional time. Innate.
